parameters.content:
## Compliance Monitor Setup

⚙️ **Configure monitoring:**
- Jurisdictions to monitor
- Contract types and categories
- Risk thresholds
- Legal team notifications

parameters.query: SELECT contract_id, contract_type, jurisdiction, signing_date, expiry_date, key_clauses, compliance_tags FROM contracts WHERE status = 'active'

parameters.message:
=

⚖️ CRITICAL COMPLIANCE EMERGENCY

Immediate legal intervention required - Risk Level: {{ $json.risk_score }}/100

📋 Regulatory Change Details

Jurisdiction: {{ $json.regulatory_update.jurisdiction }}

Title: {{ $json.regulatory_update.title }}

Date: {{ new Date($json.regulatory_update.date).toLocaleDateString() }}

Source: {{ $json.regulatory_update.url }}

Impact Areas: {{ $json.regulatory_update.impact_areas.join(', ') }}

📄 Affected Contracts ({{ $json.affected_contracts.length }})

{{#each $json.affected_contracts}}

Contract ID: {{ this.contract_id }}

Type: {{ this.contract_type }}

Expiry: {{ new Date(this.expiry_date).toLocaleDateString() }}

{{/each}}

📊 Impact Assessment

Risk Score: {{ $json.risk_color }} {{ $json.risk_score }}/100

Contracts Affected: {{ $json.impact_assessment.contract_count }}

High Priority Contracts: {{ $json.impact_assessment.high_priority_contracts }}

Estimated Review Time: {{ $json.impact_assessment.estimated_review_hours }} hours

🚨 Immediate Actions Required

  • Convene emergency legal review meeting within 24 hours
  • Conduct detailed analysis of regulatory impact on affected contracts
  • Prepare contract amendment strategies and compliance roadmap
  • Notify relevant stakeholders and department heads
  • Document all compliance actions and decisions
  • Establish timeline for contract modifications
📖 Review Regulation 📧 Alert Compliance

Alert generated: {{ $json.analyzed_at }}
This is an automated compliance alert requiring immediate attention.
parameters.subject: 🚨 CRITICAL COMPLIANCE ALERT - Immediate Legal Review Required

parameters.message:
=

🟠 HIGH PRIORITY COMPLIANCE REVIEW

Legal review required within 72 hours

A regulatory change has been identified that requires prompt legal review of affected contracts.

📋 Regulatory Update Summary

Jurisdiction: {{ $json.regulatory_update.jurisdiction }}

Title: {{ $json.regulatory_update.title }}

Impact Areas: {{ $json.regulatory_update.impact_areas.join(', ') }}

Risk Score: {{ $json.risk_color }} {{ $json.risk_score }}/100

📄 Contract Impact

Affected Contracts: {{ $json.impact_assessment.contract_count }}

Estimated Review Time: {{ $json.impact_assessment.estimated_review_hours }} hours

High Priority Contracts: {{ $json.impact_assessment.high_priority_contracts }}

📅 Recommended Timeline

  • Day 1: Initial regulatory analysis and contract review
  • Day 2: Identify specific compliance gaps and risks
  • Day 3: Develop remediation strategy and timeline
  • Week 1: Begin contract amendment process
📖 Review Regulation 📋 Schedule Review

Please prioritize this review based on the risk assessment. Contact the compliance team with any questions.
parameters.subject: 🟠 High Priority Compliance Review - {{ $json.regulatory_update.jurisdiction }}

parameters.message:
=

🟡 COMPLIANCE MONITORING UPDATE

Scheduled review recommended

A regulatory change has been identified that may impact some of our contracts. Please schedule a review within the next 2 weeks.

📊 Update Summary

Regulation: {{ $json.regulatory_update.title }}

Jurisdiction: {{ $json.regulatory_update.jurisdiction }}

Contracts Affected: {{ $json.impact_assessment.contract_count }}

Risk Level: {{ $json.risk_color }} {{ $json.risk_level }} ({{ $json.risk_score }}/100)

📋 Recommended Actions

  • Schedule contract review meeting within 2 weeks
  • Assess specific impact on affected contracts
  • Determine if contract amendments are needed
  • Update compliance documentation
  • Monitor for additional regulatory guidance

No immediate action required, but please ensure this is added to your compliance review calendar.

Next compliance check: {{ new Date(Date.now() + 14*24*60*60*1000).toLocaleDateString() }}
parameters.subject: 🟡 Compliance Monitoring Update - {{ $json.regulatory_update.jurisdiction }}

parameters.content:
## Legal Compliance

⚖️ **Automated responses:**
- Critical: Emergency legal review
- High: Priority compliance check
- Medium: Scheduled review
- Low: Routine monitoring

_metadata.name: Multi-Jurisdiction Smart Contract Compliance Monitor with Automated Alerts
